DOC.brief_summary: This study use scintigraphy technique measure gastric empty rate liquid solid food baseline administration GSK716155 placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Scintigraphy Study Assess Gastric Emptying Healthy Subjects Given GSK716155 Placebo .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman , age 18 65 , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 20 32 . If female , subject must capable child . Subjects must use tobacco , nicotine , illegal drug abuse , must take caffeine alcohol 24 hour dose set scintigraphy procedure . Subjects may HIV , hepatitis , elevate fast blood sugar level , high blood pressure , heart , lung , liver , gall bladder , gastrointestinal , pancreatic , kidney disease , untreated thyroid disease . Subjects must history alcohol abuse , must take prescription nonprescription drug within 7 day Day 1 Day 8 study , must previous exposure GLP1 mimetic exenatide . Prior radiation exposure must meet certain limit order participate study .
